MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: 6e9b9ff2-234b-6f63-0975-1afb2d86ba1a title: Composition effects description: The effect APIs enable developers to customize how their UI is rendered.

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Multiple Effect Instances with Independent Properties
Multiple Effect Instances with Independent Properties

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: IGraphicsEffect graphicsEffect = new Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ArithmeticCompositeEffect { Source1 = new CompositionEffectSourceParameter("source1"), Source2 = new SaturationEffect { Saturation = 0, Source = new CompositionEffectSourceParameter("source2") }, MultiplyAmount = 0, Source1Amount = 0.5f, Source2Amount = 0.5f, Offset = 0 }
